snippet.title: Punch Club Trailer - Out now on iOS/Steam/Android
snippet.description:
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/394310
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tinybuildgames.punchclub
iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/punch-club/id1024951378?mt=8

Train hard and avenge the death of your father in Punch Club, a fighting sim/tycoon game by Lazy Bear Games and tinyBuild. 

Previously known as "VHS Story", the game takes you to the 80s, where you're a fighter in training, getting to the top of Punch Club to avenge your father. You have to balance getting food, training, making money, and learning new fighting skills as you make your way to the top. 

Coming to Steam and Mobile this fall! 

http://tinybuild.com/PunchClub
